metadata.title: CVE-2016-9935 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The php_wddx_push_element function in ext/wddx/wddx.c in PHP before 5.6.29and 7.x before 7.0.14 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read and memory corruption) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact via an empty boolean element in a wddxPacket XML document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9935` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
php7.0 - 7.0.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.2

criterions.comment: php7.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.15-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
